products.name: TutorPoint
products.services: Branding, UI/UX Design, Frontend and backend web development
products.details: E-Learning Platform for College Students. Built using Asp.Net Core Web API, C# and Vue CLI. The aim of this project is to give Nigeria students access to online video lectures on their various courses

products.name: Vid-ly
products.details: A Mini Youtube Clone built using Vue CLI, Asp.net Core MVC.

products.name: Code
products.details: Code is a stackoverflow clone built using Vue.js, Python and Django framework

products.name: FirstBorn Assembly
products.intro: A church Management system for RCCG Firstborn Assembly, Auchi, Nigeria
products.services: Branding, UI/UX Design, Full stack web development
products.details:
Firstborn Assembly is an RCCG area HQ based in Auchi, Edo State. Some of this app functionality includes
- Members/Students Registration,
- Audio/Video sermon upload/viewing
- Event upload/viewing
- Google Auth Login. e.t.c

This web app was built using Asp.Net Core Razor Pages and C#
